posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.


Some HOFers with tougher backs:

WaJo Sov350 SGC A------->$985.ppff
Wheat Tolstoi trimmed SGC A----->$489.ppff
McGraw AB460 SGC 1------->$500.ppff
Baker Tolstoi SGC 1-------->$500.ppff
Bresnahan Cycle 350 trimmed------>$325.ppff SOLD
Bender AB350 no frame SGC 1-------->$500.ppff
Bender Port EPDG PSA 2--------> $655.ppff
Bresnahan EPDG PSA 2.5-------->$429.ppff
Cobb bat off Polar Bear SGC 1.5-------->$2875.ppff
Willis bat AB350 PSA 1--------->$325.ppff
Young Sov150 SGC 1----------->$1185.ppf
Young Sov150 SGC 1.5-------->$2000.ppff
Clarke Port Sov150 PSA 1.5mk-------->$250.ppff

Great offering, Luke! These mid-tier rare backs, especially on HOFers, are tougher than people think. Good prices.

And with backs like Drum, Uzit, Lenox getting far out of reach, these are ones to scoop up. GLWS.
